#summary One minute tutorial on handling proxy

= Introduction =

From release 0.8 onwards, you can handle proxy authentication in using {{{RestingBuilder}}}. 


= Sample code for handling proxy =
{{{
  List<Product> products = new RestingBuilder("http://http://local.myapis.com/HellosService/V1/productInput",Product.class)
      .setProxy("proxyhost", proxyport)
      .build();
}}}

= Sample code for handling proxy with authentication =

{{{
  List<Product> products = new RestingBuilder("http://http://local.myapis.com/HellosService/V1/productInput",Product.class)
      .setProxy("proxyhost", proxyport, "proxyuser","proxypassword")
     .build();
}}}
